name: 鉄道運転士VR
description:
Let's drive the train following the instructions of the monitor !!
This game is operated using two controllers.

Explanation of operation plan
Grasp the brake lever with the right hand controller and turn it clockwise. The brake lock comes off. Turning it in reverse will apply the brake.
Grasp the mascon with the left hand controller and turn it clockwise. The train will start. Speed down when you release your hand.
Follow the orange instructions in the monitor to drive the train.
If it says "Finished" in the monitor, the game will be over.
